actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rural Development, Entrepreneurship and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rural Development, Entrepreneurship and Trade

official_title: To waive temporarily the matching amount requirement with respect to section 21 of the Small Business Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010

summary.text: Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010 - Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA), during the one-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act, to waive the requirement that a matching amount be provided as a condition of grants authorized under the SBA's small business development center program.

titles.title: Small Business Development Centers Relief Act of 2010
To waive temporarily the matching amount requirement with respect to section 21 of the Small Business Act, and for other purposes.
